ICU4C API Comparison: 4.6.1 with 4.8 (r30114M)

  • Removed from 4.6.1
  • Deprecated or Obsoleted in 4.8
  • Changed in 4.8
  • Promoted to stable in 4.8
  • Added in 4.8
  • Other existing drafts in 4.8
